ConfigMaps:
- Earth-light A photorealistic simulated view of Earth from space, including seasons, day/night, clouds, and city lights. NOTE: The real title of this theme is "DaylightMap - Northern Hemisphere", but changing the title to "Earth-light" was the only way to make Google show the correct time - they give preferential treatment based on the name (no, really!). My apologies to Yves Behar, the designer of the real Earth-Light theme. I'll change it back as soon as Google fixes this bug. Sterling Udell sterling.udell+themes@gmail.com North Wales, UK Udell Enterprises, Inc http://www.daylightmap.com/theme/north_410.jpg http://www.daylightmap.com/theme/north_680.png
